txt.en: Administered salve to glum diseased pig
Healing Khûtra, Part 2
Administer salve to scheming diseased pig
You should administer the salve to diseased pigs in Khûtra. They can be found in a pen outside the Elder Hall.
Administer salve to sullen diseased pig

'You have a cure from Heshra? It's about time. Our animals are suffering just as much as our people, and between you and I, I prefer the company of the goats.\n\n'Please, help the afflicted goats and pigs here on their way back to good health.'
Administer salve to happy diseased pig
Administer salve to boisterous diseased pig
'Please, deliver the salve to the goats. Don't tarry!'
Administer salve to despondent diseased pig
Administer salve to diseased Khûtra goats ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'Thank you. It warms my heart to see the animals romping, full of energy again. Seems you're running low on that salve. You should see if Heshra has made any more, and then go see Umaris.'
Administered the improved salve to afflicted goats ([placeholder]/3)
Administer salve to glum diseased pig
You are close enough to administer the salve
Speak to Elder Ilaya about administering the improved salve to the livestock in Khûtra.
Administered salve to first diseased goat
Elder Ilaya has asked that you administer the improved salve to the afflicted goats and pigs in Khûtra. The goats can be found outside the Elder Hall.
Return to Elder Ilaya outside the Elder Hall.
You are too far to administer the salve
Administer the improved salve to afflicted goats ([placeholder]/3)
Administered salve to scheming diseased pig
Administer salve to first diseased goat
Administered salve to happy diseased pig
Administer salve to second diseased goat
Administer salve to third diseased goat
Administered salve to diseased Khûtra goats ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Administer the improved salve to afflicted goats ([placeholder]/8)
Speak with Elder Ilaya
Administered salve to third diseased goat
Administered salve to second diseased goat
Administered salve to sullen diseased pig
Administered salve to boisterous diseased pig
Administered the improved salve to afflicted goats ([placeholder]/8)
Administered salve to despondent diseased pig
